con:request.name: ModifyMerchant
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" <tem:ModifyMerchant> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Merchant> <acr2:Address1>x</acr2:Address1> <acr2:Address2>y</acr2:Address2> <acr2:AutoCloseBatch>false</acr2:AutoCloseBatch> <acr2:AutoCloseBatchHour>1</acr2:AutoCloseBatchHour> <acr2:AutoCloseBatchMinute>1</acr2:AutoCloseBatchMinute> <acr2:City>q</acr2:City> <acr2:ContactEmail>ian.christian@paladion.net</acr2:ContactEmail> <acr2:ContactFirstName>pal</acr2:ContactFirstName> <acr2:ContactLastName>test</acr2:ContactLastName> <acr2:Country>United States</acr2:Country> <acr2:DefaultTax>20</acr2:DefaultTax> <acr2:Industry xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:InvoiceOption>1</acr2:InvoiceOption> <acr2:LastSettlementDate xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:Logo xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:MaximumTax>50</acr2:MaximumTax> <acr2:MinimumTax>10</acr2:MinimumTax> <acr2:Name>paltest</acr2:Name> <acr2:Phone>1234567890</acr2:Phone> <acr2:ProcessorType xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:RecurringSaleCustomerCodeMode>MultiClient</acr2:RecurringSaleCustomerCodeMode> <acr2:SessionTimeout>15</acr2:SessionTimeout> <acr2:State>Florida</acr2:State> <acr2:TPIPassword xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:TPIUsername xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:TicketDeliveryMethod>EmailAndPrint</acr2:TicketDeliveryMethod> <acr2:UseIndustry>true</acr2:UseIndustry> <acr2:Zip>000</acr2:Zip> </acr1:Merchant> </tem:request> </tem:ModifyMerchant> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
